Text: ASME Continuing Education San Diegopst February join us at the Hilton San Diego Mission Valley COURSE NAME DATE MemberNonMember ASME Section VIII Division Repairs and Feb Alterations of Boilers and Pressure Vessels ASME Section VIII Division Design and Feb Fabrication of Pressure Vessels ASME Section VIII Division Design and Fabrication of Pressure of Pressure Vessels Feb Includes Repairs and Alterations ASME YM Geometric Dimensioning and Tolerancing Level Feb Tolerance StockUp Feb To register for a course call THEASME or visit wwwasmeorgprodev Dont forget to mention EM when you register COURSE LOCATION Hilton San Diego Mission Valley Camino del Rio South San Diego CA COURSE DATES February COURSE TIMES am pm Registration is from am am HOTEL RESERVATION HOTEL RATE Mention ASME to insure room rate Reservations accepted after the cutoff date will be on space and rate availability basis only Call us at for additional information ASME Continuing Education Institute is upgrading its group email function for better service If you have received this email in error we apologize for the inconvenience To unsubscribe please send a blank email to
